description: Adds useful information to the user interface. Based on the original UI Info Suite.
An accessibility mod for Stardew Valley with screen reader and keyboard-only support.
Allows custom spawning of forage, large objects, ore, and monsters from each farm type.
Replaces the vanilla game menu with an improved reimplementation that improves performance and provides an easy API for other mods.
A modern localization and translation framework for Stardew Valley mods.
A core mod for Shockah's Stardew Valley mods.
Allows you to build fences, walls, paths, and more in a much more streamlined way, similar to Terraria's smart cursor.
Extra map features and tile/map properties to spice up your custom maps.
Allows you to automate repetitive tasks with a little help from the Junimos. A balanced alternative to Automate.
Allows modders to exclude custom NPCs from quests and events via Content Patcher.
Allows placed chests to be picked up and carried with their contents intact.
A framework that adds miscellaneous data assets, map/tile properties, and features for other mods to use.
Framework which allows custom bushes to be added to the game that work like the tea sapling.
Allows buildings to be placed on any tile, even if obstructed by terrain or other buildings.
Framework for adding new types of chests to the game.
Till ground and plant crops on non-farm locations like Railroad, Secret Woods, Backwoods, and Desert.
Reduce or eliminate energy costs for specific tools via configurable sliders.
Prevents bait from being consumed on trash catches and when targeted bait catches the wrong fish.
